home.heading: Find behavioral health care that’s meaningful for you.

_coloradoCrisisService.heading: If you’re experiencing crisis
_coloradoCrisisService.content: No matter what you’re going through, help is available. Call Colorado Crisis Services at 844-493-TALK (8255) or text TALK to 38255.
_coloradoCrisisService.cta: Learn more about Colorado Crisis Services

_iMatter.heading: Free therapy for youth
_iMatter.content: I Matter can connect youth 18 years of age and younger (21 years or younger if receiving special education services) with a therapist for up to 6 free and confidential counseling sessions.
_iMatter.cta: Visit IMatter to find a therapist and schedule an appointment.

_standUp.heading: If you’re experiencing or using abusive behavior
_standUp.content: Connect with a professional to answer your questions and provide support to anyone who is using, experiencing, or witnessing relationship violence.
_standUp.cta: Call the Stand Up Colorado Helpline at

search.noResultsExpandRadius: There are no results within {{miles}} miles. Search a wider distance to see more results.

search.mapHelper: Tap a marker to pull up information for that location. To zoom in or out on the map on a mobile device, use a two finger pinching gesture.

helpRecipient.question: Are you looking for help for yourself or someone you care about?

answers.someone: I am searching for someone I care about

yourself.question: Select your age range so we can find the right resource type for you:

someone.question: I’m looking for help for someone who is:

yourself.question: Please select the statements below that best describe the type of help you are looking for.

answers.mental_health: My mental health (persistent feelings of sadness, loneliness, worry...)
answers.suicidal_ideation: Thoughts about killing myself and/or wishing I was dead

someone.question: Please select the statements below that best describe the type of help the person you care about is looking for.

answers.substance_use: Someone I care about needs help with drugs and/or alcohol use
answers.court_mandated_treatment: Someone I care about needs court-mandated treatment
answers.mental_health: Someone I care about needs help with mental health (persistent feelings of sadness, loneliness, worry....)
answers.suicidal_ideation: Someone I care about is having thoughts about killing themself and/or wishing they were dead
